name: Streets of Crime [Demo]
description:
A demo of a beat'em up game inspired by Streets of Rage. It was made within a few days using Godot Engine 3.4.

Credits:

- Background (art): https://opengameart.org/content/cyberpunk-street-environment

- Characters (art): https://opengameart.org/content/mv-platformer-female-32x64

- Exit door sign (art): https://opengameart.org/content/exit-door

- Music by Gigakoops: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/gigakoops/

- Typography: https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/retroscape
